Sentece: Mean oral bioavailability after single dose of rofecoxib (12.5, 25 or 50 mg) is 93% with t(max) varying widely between 2 and 9 h.
Title: Rofecoxib: an update on physicochemical, pharmaceutical, pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic aspects.
Name: Acetylsalicylic acid

Sentece: Rofecoxib is eliminated predominantly by hepatic metabolism with a terminal half-life of approximately 17 h during steady state.
Title: Rofecoxib: an update on physicochemical, pharmaceutical, pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic aspects.
Name: Acetylsalicylic acid

Sentece: Significant differences of the relative bioavailabilities are shown by Silentan-diazepam (= 118%) and Silentan-DHE-tartrate (= 310%) in comparison with the standard encapsulated preparations.
Title: [Comparative pharmacokinetics and relative bioavailability of the active principles diazepam, acetylsalicylic acid, caffeine, and dihydroergotamine tartrate in a combination product].
